message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be perfect for your needs and I'm confident it's worth a significant amount to you.  How about we start the conversation at $15,000?

Hello Alice, thank you for considering my needs. I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product. Let me know if this is something you can work with.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but my product offers significant value. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000? This price reflects the quality of what I'm offering.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I understand the value of your product, I still believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $11,000 for the product. Let me know if this is something you can work with.
